DOC.brief_title: The Influence Psychological Interventions Upon Disease Progression HIV-infected Patients Receiving Medication
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : This investigation base upon hypothesis psychological intervention may counteract detrimental effect stress psychological well-being general health . Background : HIV infection may consider life-long biological psychological stressor lead detrimental outcomes associated disease progression . Stress reduction patient may beneficial effect delay disease progression via propose interactive psycho-neuro-endocrine-immune network . Inclusion Criteria : HIV infect individual CD4 T-cell count 200 cells/mcl Receiving anti-retroviral drug Individuals sign informed consent form Investigative approach : Self-hypnosis Japanese non-touching , laying-on-of hands-like technique , call Johrei , use investigate effect psychological intervention upon immune parameter ( especially CD4 count ) associate disease progression along phenomenological association stress perception stress hormone level HIV-infected patient receive medication .
